title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.15 - Flue plugs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.15 - Flue plugs

State Regulations

No boiler shall remain in service which has one or more
fire tubes plugged at both ends of the tube unless the plugs are securely tied
together by means of a rod not less than 5/8 inch in diameter. Flue plugs must
be removed and flues repaired at the first point where such repairs can
properly be made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
922.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
